nodes.text: Renlo was a bounty hunter who vowed to capture Han Solo. He invested in the best technology and devices credits could buy, and hired private instructors to give himself an edge. Fifteen months following his preparation, Renlo had been soundly defeated by Solo, and left with no choice but to work as a cleaner in the Arc of Fire on Selenius VII. He constantly muttered "Almost had 'im" over and over again and was jokingly called "Solo's Bane" by the other hunters that frequented the bar.
